backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with resident, physician, pharmacy, insurance, and medication data types plus comparison utilities, integrating authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level summaries of major frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment and smoke‑test checklist for Version 89 with no code changes allowed.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables and global light/dark styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app flow handling identity, resilient actor initialization, startup timeout, health checks, routing, and user profile gating.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component that submits a new ADL record with date, activity, assistance level, and notes for a resident.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog for entering daily vital signs including temperature, blood pressure, pulse, respiration, oxygen saturation, glucose, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog to record medication administration details such as medication, time, administrator, and notes for a resident.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog used to add a medication to a resident, including dosage, route, administration times, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large form dialog for creating a resident profile with personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog component for adding a resident's weight entry with form fields, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with size and mode options and provides a fallback text logo on load error.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing a resident's medication, populating initial values and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large form dialog for editing all resident details including personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form allowing a new user to enter name, role, and employee ID and save via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Full‑screen error UI showing error details, diagnostics, and retry/logout actions during app startup failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Includes utilities for creating AuthClient instances with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and related backend data using actor instances, with error handling and startup-safe variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a resilient backend actor using identity when available, with timeouts, optional admin initialization, and standardized error handling via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables, dialog overrides, and extensive print styles for consistent printed output.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides utilities for actor initialization including timeouts, error normalization, and detection of non-fatal or stopped canister errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-safe URLs for static assets, normalizing slashes and supporting deployment under custom base paths.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Contains date conversion and formatting helpers for converting between nanoseconds and readable strings while avoiding timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Provides utilities to detect backend canister connection info and perform a timeout-protected health check.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays resident lists with filtering, sorting, and admin actions such as discharging or archiving residents.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and branding.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Shows detailed resident information with tabs and dialogs for editing, medication, vitals, and records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and theme settings for the app.
project_state.json: Describes project state for fixing IC backend canister issues, including stopped-canister errors, startup flow bugs, and a new healthCheck feature request.
